articles.title: Austin Butler Admits It's Hard to Break Accent After "Elvis" | Daily Pop | E! News - E! News
articles.description: Austin Butler gets candid about his method acting for Baz Luhrmann's, "Elvis." Plus, the director reveals how Denzel Washington helped Austin land the role!#...

articles.author: Associated
articles.title: Dolly Parton gives $1M to pediatric infectious disease research - Daily Mail
articles.description: Dolly Parton is donating $1 million to pediatric infectious disease research at Vanderbilt University Medical Center in Nashville, the organization announced on Wednesday.
articles.content:
